about_the_game:
"KOST" is a science fiction apocalyptic mechanical style action adventure RPG game. In the near future, the machine intelligence system "KOST" will gradually dominate the world. Human consciousness can be transferred to machine generated human chips, and in this cruel world, the struggle against darkness will eventually erupt.
Under the rule of the intelligent system "KOST", robots have gradually replaced human jobs, limiting human survival. You will play as a group of rebels, breaking through the fortress of the mechanical intelligence system.

In the game, you can transfer your consciousness to different robot-generated human chips, or play as any opponent or NPC and direct them in battle. They have different weapons and combat styles, allowing you to experience all weapons and skills.
You can acquire different special skills in the game and use them to fight. Besides using weapons, these special skills can also defeat enemies.
You can also use the collected chips to enhance character attributes and develop more powerful abilities within the game.

The game boasts a comprehensive storyline that prompts deep reflection. Will the future align with our hopes or head in an unpredictable direction? If we are at the mercy of AI, you'll unlock your thoughts within the game, facing the challenge of making choices against an all-powerful AI.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750TI or AMD HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
